title: FS:  T3 Turkey Red - Rube Waddell   VGEX+ SOLD
author: T3s

posts.post_title: FS:  T3 Turkey Red - Rube Waddell   VGEX+ SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hello,

I’ve owned this T3 Waddell for quite some time.  Never submitted to a TPG but I’ve always estimated it at a 4 - 4.5. 

Beautiful colors and clarity.  Aside from honest corner wear, there are no creases or wrinkles.  Simply a great card.  I’d be happy to send better hi-res photos if you’d like.  

Waddell is not an easy T3 and this one is very nice.  I’ve been asking SOLD (net to me, including FedEx shipping) but will consider reasonable offers.  

Thanks,
Craig
